questionTitle: The train arrived ............... the station ............ time.
It was a beautiful day. The sun shone .............. and the sky was .............
At this moment I ................ that we have a good chance of victory.
Trains are used to carry farm ......... to the city.
The water in this glass is ................ You can drink it.
He hasn't got ................ time to read this book.
Is that the hospital .............. you are working?
She often ................ her bicycle to the countryside with her friends at weekends.
The police ................ warned the people not to come home.
Her long ..................made me bored and sleepy.
My sister won't get married until she ................ 25 years old.
If you study your lesson carefully, you ................good marks.
It sometimes may be difficult .................... a taxi during rush-hours.
He .................... TV when my friend knocked at the door.
